titleStmt.title: Edward T. Newell hoard notebook, circa 1939

monogr.title: Edward T. Newell hoard notebook, circa 1939
monogr.extent: 263 pages (79 used) ; 26 x 19 cm + 1 loose sheet.

abstract.p: Notebook of handwritten notes on ancient Greek coin hoards, including Aleppo, 1893; Afiun Kara Hissar, Arpagot, 1918; Adrianople; Asia Minor, 1929; Babylon, 1900; Byblus, 1931; Chalcis, 1935; Chalcidice (Olynthus?); Demanhur, 1900; Epidaurus, 1903; Gebal (Byblus), 1931; Homs, 1934; Homs, 1927; Khorsabad; Mesopotamia (Dunne); Nicomedia (probably Thessalian hoard); Tell Halaf, 1911; Thessalian, 1938. Also, one loose sheet of Pera Palace Hotel (Constantinople) letterhead containing four pages of notes labeled "Antioch" Hoard.

revisionDesc.change: Reprocessed TEI for IIIF compliance on service URI and annotation coordinates.
Moved abstract into profileDesc, added Getty AAT ID for genre.

surface.desc: εφημερίδος Αρχαιολογική 1903. pp. 98-116. Nomismatikon eurnma ex Epidaurou = (Numismatic discoveries in Epidaurus).
